note: For the UNESCO data, adults are defined as aged 15 and over, for PIAAC data the adult population is defined as 16-65 years.
title: UNESCO literacy rate vs. PIAAC literacy proficiency
subtitle: The vertical axis measures adult literacy rates according to the UNESCO definition of "people who can, with understanding, read and write a short, simple statement on their everyday life". The horizontal axis shows adult literacy proficiency according to PIAAC tests, which measure reading skills on a continuous scale.
